title: MY TICKET HOME Reunites, Announces First Show Back
description: They're playing their first show since 2018 this month. The post MY TICKET HOME Reunites, Announces First Show Back appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 4 hours ago
excerpt: They're playing their first show since 2018 this month.
text: Reunited MY TICKET HOME Reunites, Announces First Show Back They're playing their first show since 2018 this month. My Ticket Home – the nü-tinged band that labeled themselves "puke rock" – has announced their first show since 2018 for this month! My Ticket Home will open for Church Tongue at the Half Baked Warehouse in Columbus, OH at their February 15 show alongside Sour, Walking Wounded and Violent Nature. No word on whatever else My Ticket Home has planned, but I'm already puking with excitement. My Ticket Home released their final record UnReal in 2017, and followed that up with a standalone single "Through The Needle's Eye" in 2018. Given the overall rise of nü-metal and alt-metal at the moment, there really couldn't be a better time for My Ticket Home to return! Want More Metal? html:
Reunited

MY TICKET HOME Reunites, Announces First Show Back

They're playing their first show since 2018 this month.

My Ticket Home – the nü-tinged band that labeled themselves "puke rock" – has announced their first show since 2018 for this month! My Ticket Home will open for Church Tongue at the Half Baked Warehouse in Columbus, OH at their February 15 show alongside Sour, Walking Wounded and Violent Nature. No word on whatever else My Ticket Home has planned, but I'm already puking with excitement.

My Ticket Home released their final record UnReal in 2017, and followed that up with a standalone single "Through The Needle's Eye" in 2018. Given the overall rise of nü-metal and alt-metal at the moment, there really couldn't be a better time for My Ticket Home to return!
